website_summaries.verdict: This console stands out for its relative ease of assembly and its ability to easily support a heavier or larger television.
pros: Comes in a variety of finishes
Assembles easily, and in less time than other models
Nice modern look, and the fire puts out a lot of heat
cons: Heater fan is a little loud
The covers for the cam lock fittings do not stick well, although a little glue will take care of this
Some issues with it arriving with broken parts

customer_reviews.title: Top Shelf
customer_reviews.text: This tv stand with mount worked out perfect. Yes it was heavy. Yes it took all afternoon to build, but I love it. Now my tv is a 65" Samsung and look how well it looks mounted on the attached stand. The shelves below hold all of my components. The espresso color works well with our furniture. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie C. Rox

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend and I have been looking for a tv table for our 64' for months now and we couldn't find one we liked for under $700
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews but this is a superb product, espically for the price. My boyfriend and I have been looking for a tv table for our 64" for months now and we couldn't find one we liked for under $700. This is pressed wood so it's very solid, much sturdier than particle board and looks great. They include everything you need to put it together in the box and the instructions are easy to follow. My boyfriend put it together not me but it took him under an hour and a half to do so. It's heavy duty and looks great in our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, sturdy and goes perfectly if you have limited space and want a "skinny" tv media center!
customer_reviews.author: L Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great console, Great service
customer_reviews.text: Awesome TV console at a great price...there was a blemish on top of the stand that stood out. I contacted the company, they got back to me very quick and had no problem getting a new top for the stand. Great customer service and a great product 👌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Well, this was a disaster. I'm not one to turn my nose at cheap, put it together yourself furniture. I love it, I really do. This, however, was the worst experience I've ever had. The included screws, bolts, wood pieces, etc. were so weak that the screws stripped immediately upon beginning to tighten and the cam locks split into two or three pieces when tightened. The wood split in so many places. It sure did look nice coming out the box. The materials included are sub par, however, and, I can only imagine, dangerous. Promptly returned for a refund from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: One of the shelves broke when installed. A corner ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the shelves broke when installed. A corner shattered with only regular pressure. The MDF wood must have had a weak spot there. I just want the shelf, but cannot find a way on amazon to get one piece sent to me. I am giving feedback for help in getting the shelf. I cannot send the whole thing back as it is big and took hours to put together. Once I have this issue resolved I'll give a proper review.
customer_reviews.author: TheBirdReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased! Amazing tv stand
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about ordering a product online without seeing it up close, but it arrived 1 day early and packaged extremely well. There was no damage to any of the pieces. It is so pretty! Highly recommend to anyone that is interested, only took me about an hour and 15 minutes to put together myself because I took my time and used all the wood glue for extra stability! Holds my Vizio 55", sound bar and extras with room to spare
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: The 5 Star Stand
customer_reviews.text: Been looking a long time for just the right TV stand.... Found it. Got it in the driftwood color...beautiful. It's a sturdy piece, and was easy to put together. It's not real wood, but it's textured to feel like it, and no one will tell the difference. Got a 55" on it with pleanty of room to spare. Great looking piece, would recommend it to anyone looking to upgrade from those standard black TV stands we all had, or for the larger flatscreens 55"-60". This ones a 5 star for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Healey

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I've just moved into a new home and have bought all new furniture using outlets and discount sites. Some tables were a complete nightmare to put together. So much so that I dreaded this project. The box is huge and heavy so that's the point you need help. Let me say that I could hug whoever engineered and wrote the instructions. It was a completely easy 1.5 hours by myself. Not a single frustrating moment.. It's sturdy and looks fantastic. I was expecting the fireplace to be hokey but it's actually mesmerizing. I wanted the Driftwood but timing made me go with black and I'm quite happy with it. 65 inch tv has room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: M. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: So far I am in love with this stand
customer_reviews.text: So far I am in love with this stand! It's large enough to hold my electronics as well as my 60 inch tv! The fireplace is gorgeous and puts off a good amount of heat. Pretty easy to put together too. You will need to drill starter holes at the end when you go to screw the fireplace insert into place. Made it much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: An excellent buy! No, it's not real wood, but unless you're standing over it with a microscope, that won't be obvious to anyone looking at it. Assembly was very easy -- all parts were clearly numbered and labeled, and hardware was numbered in separate bags for each set. It's mainly cam-lock assembly, and all holes lined up perfectly. The finish is perfect for our farmhouse/rustic/industrial room. After shopping around, I got it for $100 less on Amazon than it was listed at one of the big online home furnishing sites. I had looked at other media stands costing hundreds more, and could not be more pleased with this choice. (TV in the picture is a 50 inch.)
customer_reviews.author: Fiction Fan

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it's shorter than I thought but it really nice. It's hand controlled no remote (which would have been nice). You can just have the light (fire burning) without the heat, very cozy. It took us 2 1/2 hours to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Me in NOLA

customer_reviews.title: This product from Walker Edison is like taking a walk through Sweden or Thailand
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was OVER Ikea. Frayed Knot. This product from Walker Edison is like taking a walk through Sweden or Thailand. I use to enjoy putting projects like this together. Never More. I have always used wood glue when using "Cam Locks", as any movement of the unit, post construction, promotes deterioration, disability and ultimate destruction. I would have paid twice the price for a product that had the end user in consideration. Construction was satisfactorily completed, however, most people will have problems putting this product together. I would classify this product as a "P.O.S." Sorry for this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Parsons

customer_reviews.title: It's Cheap, but Not Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: This is a very low quality product. All the materials are sub par and wont last long. The holes for the dowels were drilled too wide and too deep on my unit, rendering the dowels (which are for sturdiness) completely useless. If you put this together and never move it, it may be okay to set your tv on. But if you need to move it once in a while, for cleaning, wiring, relocating, etc., I believe it will start falling apart after a couple of moves. In large print on the box it says, "Designed in the USA". I don't think I'd brag about this Chinese manufactured product being designed in the USA...
customer_reviews.author: Just Honest

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and unsafe!
customer_reviews.text: This product came in damaged packaging. After opening seemed to have everything until I get the middle legs. Piece 8 to be exact. It was missing. I decide to keep building regardless and I just would like to say the screw fastener pieces break very easy. I got the whole thing built. Went to move it and one side came completely unattached. I dont even feel safe have thos garage in my house let alone putting a tv on it. I do dont recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: William stone

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Product was defective. After assembling each piece when it came to the step of attaching the right and lift sides to the center piece the bolts where too short and the threading inside was defective. So your only recourse is to take the thing apart and resend or wait for the manufacturer to resend parts. Not worth the hassle either way. I just want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece with easy to follow directions...
customer_reviews.text: At first I was a bit skeptical after taking out the first piece from the box - the colour I wasn't sure about. The box was marked 70+ lbs so I had two guys that live in the building help me bring it into my condo. The product was very well packed - nothing broken at all! This took me about 2 hours by myself to put together. I'm not big on do-it-yourself type things, however this was pretty simple and the instructions were very easy to follow. I love it now that it's together - my family and friends love the color; as do I. This was delivered ahead of schedule. Very happy!!! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline H.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product...
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy material screws broke off when I was assembling this product. Do not but I wouldn't recommend these stand to anyone. I ended up buying a metal TV stand that supports up to 65" from Walmart for under 100$ better quality Smh I may had to wait a few more days for it to arrive but it was worth it it didn't calaspe in front of me. I'm just grateful my TV wasn't on top of it. I was going to send it back but it takes too much of my time/effort to repack just to ship...
customer_reviews.author: kuntryboi

customer_reviews.title: WE 60" Entertainment Center
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for an much smaller but nice looking entertainment center and this one fit that criteria. It is sturdy, stylish, and just what we wanted. It was a little more complicated to assemble than I thought it would be so be prepared for that and assemble it near where you want to use it because it is heavy and not easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV stand!
customer_reviews.text: The wood isn't heavy but it's a solid piece of furniture and looks expensive. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Is it particle board? Yes. Is it sturdy and beautiful anyway? YES!
customer_reviews.text: Brand new house, and I wanted quality but not necessarily the final piece of furniture I'll ever buy. I need the TV stand to hold my Sony gaming system and support my Klipsch sound bar, and my LG 65" OLED TV until I'm ready to mount it on my living room wall. TV stand is sturdy, especially for particle board. Quality, fit, and finish are supurb. Not a single scratch, misalignment, missing piece, mar, blemish, or other unpleasant experience. Assembled by myself with a single racheting screwdriver in less than 2 hours. Perfect color, too! Highest recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Nick O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: Despite my husband running into a few issues with the instructions, we’re happy with the final product. The manual is pretty undetailed and you don’t see your mistake until the end. Luckily it wasn’t a huge deal and we just had to break off one of the wood nubbies (dials?) and use some wood glue because it was on upside down. Speaking of...because of the bajillion comments suggesting you buy extra wood glue before assembly...we got a thing of Gorilla Wood Glue. My husband didn’t even use it and our stand is very sturdy so I’m not sure what people are needed it for. LOL
customer_reviews.author: C. Collingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this TV stand and most of the reviews were positive so I decided to buy it. Upon arrival the box was very damaged but I still hoped the stand would be intact, however, this wasnt the case. One of the larger panels has an obvious crack down the center support which a lot of the TV's weight has to rest on. I attempted to put the stand together despite having this damaged product however with time, the TV stand will not last. Try to find a better stand if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, but it was cheap, so I got what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: It looks ok, was very cheap and works, so it's fine. You would never confuse it with a quality piece of furniture, but if you want something that will hold a large screen TV, look generally ok and not cost too much, this could be the answer. Double check the depth of cabinet you need. I failed to do this and discovered that a couple of my larger home theater components are too deep to fit in this cabinet. It was my fault for not checking the size, but the creators should really have made it larger, it's too small for many of the components that customers are likely to want to put inside it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Blow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Look for me
customer_reviews.text: Great stand for the cost....no need to buy high end for triple the cost. In the picture is my 65" on the stand so you can see the size comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Klotz IV

customer_reviews.title: The fireplace stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice, but during the summer I did not use the fire place (for obvious reasons). Come winter, it wouldn't turn on, or let out hot air. I called the manufacturer and a representative told me that the fire place works like a car battery-that is, if it isn't used regularly it will stop working completely. Very disappointed. I had to buy a new fire place for it for $100 including shipping. Again, very disappointing, and the reason why I removed 2 stars. Also, the little stickers to put over the screws to hide them fall off from the heat of the fire place. Aside from that, though, this is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Goods..returning.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this item. All I needed was a part. One Part. No help from the manufacturer.....COULD NOT COMPLETE THEIR PARTS ORDER FORM ON LINE....they wanted loads of info....their downloader did not work....almost like they didn't want to supply one replacement for one damaged leg......Tough to repack, but I did it...back it goes...HIGHLY ""NOT RECOMMENDED"". Two hours work for nothing.....run away from this item..........I have bought knock down build yourself furniture before.....there was always an 800 number and they sent out replacement parts without a hassle unlike this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: VIPERICHNAPLES

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice in pictures and the finish on the wood is nice, BUT this item is a piece of junk!! The clasps don't hold the wood is that particle board that is not sturdy!! I had three bolts that broke thru the wood!! Nothing held together, once u had everything in place and tried to.move it into place everything fell apart!! Wish I was able to return it. But I threw away all the packaging after I opened it!! So I flushed a$100 down the toilet!!
customer_reviews.author: David Lowe

customer_reviews.title: I am so overly disappointed with this item
customer_reviews.text: I am so overly disappointed with this item. I would return it, but I spent so long putting it together, I wouldn't know where to begin to take it apart... except with a sledge hammer. The item has a solid rod iron-ish holder in the back. You line up the screws with the pre drilled holes. Well, once put together, it's lopsided. Then, when I decide that I'll just live with that, it doesn't actually accommodate "up to 58"", as it wouldn't fit my 49" tv. So yeah, very disappointed and frustrated that I can't return the stupid thing.... The box is gone and I'd have to take it apart. LAME.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee loving mom

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered broken. Both of the horizontal slabs had huge cracks in it, but none of the other ones did. Was cracked all the way through those two slabs so it would seem odd that it was wrecked during shipping but I don't know. Seemed nice and I was excited to get it. May try getting it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is. Average. China stuff. One corner of it was peeling up upon arrival. It’s just cheap wood covered with a vinyl-ish sticker. Put some super glue on the corner the vinyl where it was peeling up to keep it down. Not really sure why the seams of this vinyl are on the top sides. If anyone has kids or pets that might be brushing up against this I would maybe go for a different alternative. If it was more expensive the star rating would be lower. It’s cheap. It works. It looks nice. Not expecting this to hold up through multiple moves or anything like that. 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan M King

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at the product quality
customer_reviews.text: this product is really well-made. I Thought that it was going to be a flimsy light weight product. Very heavy. very sturdy. I gave it a four star only because I thought the fireplace did still look a little fake. I’ve seen better. But that’s the only reason I Gave it a four star rating. Other than that the directions had a few errors in it. A logical person could figure it out but if you were dead set on doing exactly what the instructions said, you’d have a hard time putting it together at the end. It took a good while to put together but it really wasn’t complicated it all. Love the way it looks really nice product.
customer_reviews.author: consumer

customer_reviews.title: faulty product sadly cam locks or the holes
customer_reviews.text: I'm so annoyed with this product. I have purchased furniture and put it together more times than I can count but this product was defective. Instructions where pretty simple. Cam locks were the problem. They did not lock securely. I pretty much had to add extra wood glue because the locks would not stay locked. The cam locks are in the correct space and also directions followed precisely. I like the finished look. I was so annoyed I definitely didn't want to pack all this stuff back up then ship back it is such a hassle. Very disappointed. Also just to be very clear I know how to apply cam locks.
customer_reviews.author: shanna

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it was super hard to put together. But now that it's together and all of that is behind me, I love this thing. The fireplace is a really nice touch. I plugged it into a smart plug, so I can turn it on and off with a variety of lighting in the living room and it's a great little relaxing addition to the vibe. The unit is super wide, which is nice if you have the space. For us, it fits a large TV with two plants on either side of the TV, then the shelves are good for whatever. It's pricey, yes, but it was worth it for us.
customer_reviews.author: Brian & Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Looks great once put together and comes with some faux wood ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great once put together and comes with some faux wood grain stickers to cover up the screws, you really cannot tell they were ever there. I was able to fit about 100 DVD's and an Xbox in the cubbys and have a 37 inch flat screen on top and it seems very secure. The wood is not as "espresso" as the photograph would have you believe, it is just a little bit lighter and has a slight greyish patina, but still looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoculturistTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Money
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, I believe we should rate things within their price point and with ample consideration of its intended use and user. With that in mind, I believe this TV stand is everything it claims to be, as an inexpensive, easy to assemble (if you are patient and think ahead) and sturdy piece of furniture. I personally find it to be reasonably attractive and also found the color to be very close to the pictures provided. I mounted a 75" LG TV and bolted the legs to the base. I would not hesitate to purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Lovely no-frills TV stand. Easy assembly instructions. It took me probably an hour and a half to build; it would take two people half that time. My only issues with it are that the TV mount comes with no way to attach the TV to it (it’s just a bar with holes in it, no screws included) and the cam bolts on the unit don’t “lock” and just fall out. Just the process of moving the completed TV stand two feet to its final position caused two of these bolts to work loose and fall out. I guess you could squirt glue in there but the instructions only mention using the glue for the wooden pegs.
customer_reviews.author: nathan corwin

customer_reviews.title: Zero Customer Support--frustrating experience
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this media stand and received it 16 days later (even though the product is prime shipping eligible). After receiving the product, a primary support piece is missing several pre-drilled holes, so I'm unable to put the stand together. On 9/4 I emailed the manufacturer with photos and asked for a replacement part. It's now 9/13 and I haven't received a reply. The stand otherwise looks great, but buy it at your own risk! I'm now stuck and can't return a stand that's somewhat put together!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We had just brought 60" TV's but the stands we had would not accommodate them. So I ordered this stand since we needed a corner stand. When the product arrived the box was damaged but the pieces weren't. I will say that assembly took a while because of the may pieces that was needed to complete assembly. Once we were done putting the stand together I have to say that it was well worth the time to put together. It accompanies the decor for the rest of the room and we have gotten so many compliments on how beautiful it is. Plus with the size and dimensions it would accommodate a TV up to 70". Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Long

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged but salvageable
customer_reviews.text: A corner of one of the pieces arrived damaged but we were able to salvage it because my boyfriend works in construction and knows how to deal with things like that. I don't think I would have been able to make it work on my own without the skill set and expertise he has. Now that we have it all put together, it looks much nicer than it really is. It's flimsy material and if you're going to put a 70"in TV on it you will need to add extra support legs in the middle so as to support the weight. All in all, it's a good buy if you have the expertise (or problem-solving skills) to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It's been half-assembled in my living room for the last 2 weeks bc leg #12 was missing the pre-drilled holes. I contacted the company about the issue and no response. Finally, had the idea to drill the holes myself. My boyfriend took it to his parent's house and as his dad began to drill it, he noticed that the holes were already there, they were just covered by whatever film they used to color it. Weird to explain, but just by looking at it, we couldn't even tell they were there. But all the holes were there.. punched em out with a pencil. If you like reaching out to companies and not getting a response, this one is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: First off I love this tv stand. No it's not real wood but for the price no one will know. I purchased the barnwood color and it couldn't be better with ths decor. If your looking for a cheaper tv stand this thing is awesome. Instructions are good. Takes time but is well worth it. I did not insert the 2 outside shelfs because I wanted to use the sides for boot storage. Works and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks very nice
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this. I have a 65" tv that fits perfect on it! Fits the corner great with minimal space! The shelving underneath is more open and larger than i expected so that is a plus. I love that the back pieces have a hole is each shelving unit so that I can plug in everything easily and nicely. It's sturdy! I don't have any worries about the structure. It was very easy to put together by myself with the instructions. Everything fit perfectly, no marks or anything like that on the actual shelves. Love everything about this tv stand!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not good pkg ruinT item
customer_reviews.text: Sorry it’s like recycled cardboard. Box is too long and panels were broke in middle. Three wife inside but middles break! Change your packaging even team lifting they’ll break n flex the middle boards too much. I know I do this for a living 21 years now off ya go back to the drawing boards in pkg
customer_reviews.author: Llcbsc

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we were looking for. The assembly of it wasn't fun but not difficult either. It's definitely a two person job though. It has a classic look with a nice dark espresso wood tone. It seems structurally solid. We have a 55" TV and it's a great size. I would recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MLR

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but...
customer_reviews.text: We finally found a TV stand we liked! Ordered it, arrived in expected time frame! It took an hour and a half to put together. Was made with quality materials and had detailed instructions. However we were not aware that it did not come with the screws to actually mount the TV until after we got the product. Just took a little research on my TV and one quick trip to the hardware store. Length is 20mm, but you need to find out which metric screw you need by researching your TV or looking at your manual. Overall pleased with the product!
customer_reviews.author: ItsMrsMcCoy

customer_reviews.title: Ikea quality, but it’s okay..
customer_reviews.text: Same quality and instructions as Ikea furniture. Easily put together by myself. I wish it had a couple inches more depth though to fit my HTPC without it sticking out slightly. But it’s nothing a slight modification in the back can’t fix. I also noticed it easily scratches and exposes the particle board underneath. Some matching wood stain would hide it though. So long as you don’t beat it up, dent it, or scrape your consoles on the wood and the stand will maintain it’s sleekness. All in all it serves as an okay basic TV stand. For the price you can probably find better.
customer_reviews.author: Noel G.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stand! Highly recommended for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My friend and I put this together and it took about 2 hours. We used an electric screw driver as well as a regular screw driver. It is very sturdy and looks great in my living room, but there were a couple of large scratches on the top. I didn't feel like taking apart what we had already put together and sending back, so I decided to keep it and use both wood & shoe polish to make the scratches less noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: YAHsmart

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions where not bad but not great. It does take a while to build. We did use more glue then it came with. It’s kinda heavy so getting the boxes (yes boxes more then one) inside it toke my son and wife to bring it in. Very happy. it looks really good. It’s in my cold basement after 20 minutes we turn it off because it gets the room at the comfortable temp. we don’t need to run for long. It heats well. my 72 inch tv sets right on it and no issues with heat at all. Basement is cold all year.
customer_reviews.author: mw

customer_reviews.title: Clean and organized!
customer_reviews.text: We needed an upgrade from our last cheap, tiny tv stand. This one perfectly fits all our gaming consoles and looks nice and neat with the wire holes in the back. Nice and clean looking and doesn't take up too much space in our apartment. Definitely would recommend two people putting this thing together. It was pretty easy, just time consuming. Only hard part (we have no power tools, only a screw driver) were the center pieces where you have to get a screw through the wood/board with an allen wrench. That part took the longest & the most muscle. End result is fantastic though, definitely worth giving up a Saturday afternoon putting together.
customer_reviews.author: Col

customer_reviews.title: All the pieces were there, went together nice, solid and sturdy ( no cardboard back!)
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy piece of furniture with a solid back, not cardboard. Easily holds a large heavy TV. Driftwood matches our rustic old heavy pine tables. Slightly more taupe, if you are expecting gray. We were hoping for that taupe color or it would not have matched the old weathered, abused, and naturally distressed pine tables. I was hesitant about buying this because the price was so low, and I have been disappointed with cheap furniture in the past. The reviews were good, and it exceeds expectations. This does not look cheap at all, and it is even more heavy and sturdy than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Nealzilla

customer_reviews.title: On the surface it is nice, it was a PIMA to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The bottom piece was cracked when we received the package. But not broken, the instructions were not easy and the parts were labeled incorrectly, so I cannot make use of the shelves provided. Or the finishing back pieces. The screws to hold the “fireplace” are barely big enough to secure. It is too cumbersome to disassemble and return. So we’ll make due with what we have. Will not recommend to family or friends.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A. Reed

customer_reviews.title: cheap but good
customer_reviews.text: It's a simple piece, it's particle board and like a few pieces of plywood. It's solid and not too difficult to assemble, working at a snail's pace and alone I'll get it done in an hour and faster than that if you're not an idiot like me We couldn't find a simple stand that wasn't a grand or more and didn't look like complete garbage. This match the floor and actually, it looks great from 5 feet away. And it doesn't have any tacky Bs.... 🤙
customer_reviews.author: K. Dysprosia

customer_reviews.title: Best 70" TV Stand for Money
customer_reviews.text: The box had a long trip (numerous tears and some holes) but kudos to the manufacturer for packing it very securely. The build time was average and there were a few delays trying to understand the directions and pictures. I did not install the back panel on the far right side so my home theater receiver could be installed without removing all the speaker wires and provide ample air circulation. Build quality is very sturdy and it's a nice stand...for the money I would say it's a great stand. The TV won't arrive for a few days and I'll update this review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Singh

customer_reviews.title: If you are not a very handy person don'y buy
customer_reviews.text: Most of the cabinet went together ok but the left panel and legs where mis-drilled and would have stopped the assembly if I wasn't able to measure and drill correct lock-pin holes.
customer_reviews.author: KennyCtheAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the money. The box came looking pretty beat up so I feared it would be damaged - but it was very well packed and nothing was damaged after all. You'll need a phillips screwdriver and a set of allen wrenches... the allen wrench that comes with it is very weak and bent right away at the tip - making it useless. Overall the setup was very straightforward and easy (good instructions). The finished product looks great and my girlfriend loves the mini heater.
customer_reviews.author: InkedGeek

customer_reviews.title: Some significant flaws but still a good value
customer_reviews.text: Pros- Looks very nice and fits snugly in the corner. Great color and seems very sturdy. Cons- Cheap particle board so you can't move it around a lot or the screws will loosen, funky instructions, filthy material inside the box, tore up packaging..... If you're on a budget and the cons I listed are not a big deal to you, it's a great value for the money. When built, this stand looks a lot more expensive than it actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Derpy

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product for a Good Price.
customer_reviews.text: The delivery time, form, fit and function met or exceeded my expectations. The directions for assembling the TV stand were straight forward and complete. There were more than enough dowels and cams to assemble the item. I can not state the exact total time I used for assembling the stand because I took entertainment breaks between assembly. However, breaks are not necessary. My calculation is that assembly by one person would be 1-1/2 hour. Although it was not necessarily needed, I supplemented the glue provided with my own wood glue to ensure stability. My 55" Sony Bravia Smart TV fits comfortably atop the stand. I highly recommend this TV storage stand to others because the price and quality are comparable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gail

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fireplace tv stand! We love it! (Even in Florida)
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this together, took about 3.5 hours as the instructions weren’t fully correct so following them to the letter doesn’t actually work. Luckily he was able to figure it out. Other than that we LOVE this tv stand. It’s a little rocky on our carpet but we have our tv mounted to the wall so it doesn’t really affect our setup. The rocking seems to be more our carpets issue than the stand. The heating element is super hot so we can’t have it on in Florida very often. We highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: JuliaGoolia86

customer_reviews.title: A nice upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: Most definitely an upgrade to my tv stand for my 55 inch tcl 6 series! I had the TV before mounted on a computer stand and for almost two years I had to have the TV legs inverted just so they can fit. I received the TV stand today and probably took a good 2 hours to assemble, may have probably been quicker but I needed to use my old TV stand to set up for my work station (currently working from home). The instruction where pretty clear and the illustrations really help me figure out where goes what.
customer_reviews.author: CaddyLs305

customer_reviews.title: Looks fine but
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are simple but the build quality is another thing. Wood is less quality(plywood) so it's easily cracked and broken. Had difficult time not stripping the screws, cheap furniture screws so be sure to use a flathead and have someone to help me you. It looks nice now in my living room but be sure not to move it so much especially trying to lift it from the top. It will come right off, overall I would have spent a bit more on something more sturdier
customer_reviews.author: E.G

customer_reviews.title: Holds my 75” Samsung TV
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking tv stand. This is a particle board based product but has nice finish. Make sure you add orange plastic shims to back it helps with sturdiness. The back of stand says only holds up to 58” and description on amazon says a different size so who knows but I’ve had no sagging issues with my 75” tv on this so far. It’s not a very deep stand I had to buy a 270 degree hdmi adapter from monoprice for my PS4 so it would fit within stand without hanging over.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: not built to last
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased this product in 2016 and at first, it seemed like a solid deal. unfortunately, this stand has severe structural issues. mainly due to the use of cam locks. This thing would be great you never had to touch it again once you put it together. any time this stand is moved, these cam locks will loosen. overtime this product will completely fall apart, literally. the structural integrity is so garbage that my 2-year-old was able to disassemble it by hand after it had already loosened itself over time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Really nice Tv stand !!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice TV stand. Very simple and modern style. It shipped fairly quick and the box was not torn or damaged severely like what everyone else has been saying in these comments. None of the pieces were broken , although some had a few little scratches and dings but nothing too major. It took about 2 hrs to assemble. The assembly was easy, you just need patience. It came with a little booklet instruction. All in all, I really like it and I’m content with this product. I will update about sturdiness as time goes on and see how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn jenn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this piece after many reviewers were saying it was a sturdy item. And let me tell you, I'm usually not very confident when I put together furniture, but when I was assembling this guy, I recall thinking "holy smokes, there's anchors upon anchors to this beast!" It looks great, has awesome storage and console support, and overall it's great for the price. That's a 55" TV in my pictures for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Crafted to last & easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I saw two degrees in the packaging when it arrived. I was concerned. But opened it to find the surfaces were very well protected. The directions were very clear. I put it together alone in just under two hours. The craftsmanship is clearly intended for this stand to last a long time. Now I just need to purchase the tv. My only concern is how well the exterior will hold up over 5 years; if the surfaces are scratch-resistant. Other than that, I love it !!
customer_reviews.author: Ashante

customer_reviews.title: Almost a perfect score!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I double teamed and put this together. Took us about 2 hours. Every was going great until it was time to put pieces 15 and 13 together (which I think are the legs for the left side prospectively) the screws wouldn’t stay tight and kept coming out. We were still able to put it together fully, and I even laid on it to check how sturdy it was and it didn’t topple and I’m wel over 200lbs. Only other complaint is that there isn’t hardly enough wood glue, which I was made aware of already when I read the reviews so I had ordered some in advance. Looks great in my living room though
customer_reviews.author: QueenTee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build ... very nice price
customer_reviews.text: I swore i wasn't going to construct one more piece of furniture so I shopped furniture stores first. I concluded that ... for $250 to $500 more for the same thing ... I'll build it. I just put it together. I am a 70 year old woman, not especially handy and it took less an hour and a half of easy work to put this together. Start it on a table or counter ... it's heavy. It looks real nice and seems quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: V. A. Humbyrd

customer_reviews.title: Great value, looks amazing, easyish to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Took about two hours to build start to finish, looks great in our living room, fits my 60 inch Vizio with no issue. Never afraid that the stand will tip, or fall apart. I've even moved the TV stand with the TV still mounted and all of my electronics still on the shelves and the stand held up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeryl Polacek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my room
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a new console with an electric fireplace for our colder basement in an espresso color to match other furniture. This worked perfect! It was packaged well and the assembly did take some time, but worth it in the end. The heat put out by the "fireplace" is very helpful for our needs and it holds an older LCD tv (very heavy by today's standards!) without a problem. Plenty of storage options with the shelves on the sides. I'm very happy with this console.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bigger stand for my new TV and ordered this one. It took a while to assemble and wasn't quite as straightforward as I would have liked, but it came together nicely in the end and looks good. It's very sturdy and has 4 shelves which can be moved up or down a notch, but the width is fixed. It is not extremely deep, but most modern devices will fit just fine. I had an old DVD player which holds 5 DVDs and it wasn't deep enough for that. But all my other devices fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Chronepsis

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to clean/dust
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our 55" flat screen TV. This stand holds up perfectly. There's still enough room on the sides to put our vertical gaming system, and it doesn't appear to bend or bow with weight. The color is rich and dark, and doesn't look cheap. It's easy to clean/dust, and still looks brand new a year after purchasing. The shelves are bigger than I initially thought. The two upper shelves are enough to hold a DVD player/small game system/DVR, etc. The two shelves underneath house a collection of books, games, and storage cubes. The whole system was easy and quick to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy for me...beware
customer_reviews.text: I’m so annoyed. I was excited and saw easy assembly reviews...um not! For starts, do not glue the dowels in as instructed. You will find they interfere later; The instructions weren’t great. They had pictures but if you try to follow them you won’t be able to assemble your station. My problems started around step 9 I’m super frustrated so the unit will be going back
customer_reviews.author: Tamla

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: It was a little challenging to assemble! The directions are not complete enough and gave misinformation. I was a Woodshop teacher and tried to follow the directions completely, but in final assembly had to wing it! Make sure you get the sides to fit before using the supplied glue! Elmer's White Glue would work just fine it you need more!
customer_reviews.author: Sailor Joel

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and nice-looking. I am a 70-year-old woman, and I managed to assemble it in one afternoon. But it was not easy! It is heavy, and my grandsons had to carry the box in for me. Tightening the screws for the center leg was difficult, and I had to use a wrench to hold the doohicky to twist the screw, but eventually I prevailed. Putting the top shelf in place was quite a challenge, and it would have gone much better if I had another person with me, but it finally dropped into place with patience. That's the key in putting this together. Patience.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Copenhaver

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: We got our stand in the mail with all parts included. The box it came in was struggling a bit as it looked like it was about to fall apart. However the contents of our package were perfect! The white is not a white white but almost a distressed white. The instructions were similar to ikea furniture instructions except had a description of what you needed to do for each step. Our tv Is a 50” tv and still has space on the stand. The stand itself after assembly is pretty sturdy and we are happy with our purchase! Picture attached Only had one light on in the room so sorry for the bad quality picture.
customer_reviews.author: KrystleB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for a 55 inch TV!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this tv stand. We have had it for well over a month and it does not disappoint. The color is gorgeous, the stand is very sturdy, and the fact it has 4 shelves is really helpful for holding blue ray players, gaming consoles, etc. The only thing I would suggest is having extra wood glue on hand as the little bottle it comes with runs out fast and you need some extra. (It helps support the screws and items it comes with to put this piece together to hold it sturdy and strong.)
customer_reviews.author: Imke

customer_reviews.title: Pretty beautiful, easy to build, not too low: Do not confuse "Only for packaging" wood pieces for actual TV stand part
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd review. At first, I opened the delivery box and saw a few wood pieces broken and was very disappointed, thinking I'll have to deal with return of this huge box etc. I bought many furniture from IKEA, have never ever seen "Only For Packaging" type of wood pieces as additional protection. The broken pieces were indeed marked as "Only for Packaging", and truly meant to protect the actual TV stand parts, which they did! The actual tv stand parts are numbered. Assembly was easy, there was no step that confused me [and, I'm not handy type :) ]. I really love the TV stand, cannot wait to start watching my 65" TV on it :)
customer_reviews.author: Seattleite

customer_reviews.title: Complex assembly but good product.
customer_reviews.text: My grandparents finally upgraded their TV to a 55inch so I purchased this for them to to fit their new tv. I will say the finished product is pretty nice and they are happy with it. The assembly is fairly complex which is why I only have it 4 stars. It will take most people over an hour to assembly this piece. Be patient and read each step carefully. Better than everything we looked at at walmart for the same or more money and it was delivered to their front door.
customer_reviews.author: bevertooth

customer_reviews.title: White is actually a Light Grey
customer_reviews.text: So the stand itself is pretty good quality for being particle board. I would recommend. HOWEVER if you’re wanting White (which is what I ordered) it’s more of a light grey than white. My husband had already put it together before I saw it otherwise I would’ve returned it. I wish I had known because I would’ve ordered a different color. It shouldn’t be advertised as White. That’s my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stand
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a long time for an affordable table with a fireplace. This stand was really easy to put together as long as you pay close attention to certain pieces and don’t put them on the wrong sides/backwards. I love the look of this table. So much space on top and on the shelves. It gets so many compliments and makes the room feel complete. I would definitely recommend this stand if you are looking for a sturdy piece of furniture. I would also recommend putting felt pads under the bottom. I am able to easily slide it out all the time on the hardwood floors to clean under it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Could not have been easier
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected. No broken pieces. Assembled in less than an hour. I can't overstate how flawless this whole process went from purchase to assembly. The instructions are straightforward and idiot-proof. They have illustrations showing you the various holes in each piece. If you pay attention, this makes it impossible to orient them incorrectly. I always do my research when purchasing online, and negative reviews are an important part of that research. If you're on the fence about this, go for it. I rolled the dice and wound up very satisfied and pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dres

customer_reviews.title: Great TV stand
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in my living room. The height of it is perfect to make the TV at eye level, and it's deep enough but not too deep, so it saves space. There is plenty of room for my TV, DVD player, DVD collection, board games, and more. It seems very stable. It was easy to assemble, and I was able to do it alone, though the process took me about 3 hours. I do recommend vacuuming all the pieces with a brush attachment and/or wiping them off with a damp cloth before starting assembly, as they are quite dirty. I didn't do this until I had finished assembling it, and by then my hands were black.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy P

customer_reviews.title: Worthless piece of trash
customer_reviews.text: Go through the step by step to put it together, get to step 15 (yes 15 of 18), which is the step you put the top on the all of the bottom pieces you have carefully crafted together, only to discover the manufacturer had some monkey drilling the holes, because about 6 of them were so off they didn't even touch the bottom piece at all. In order for the top piece to fit AT ALL into the bottom pieces nearly 20 dowels and cam bolts have to align perfectly. Note for future purchasers, when 6 or more DON'T ALIGN, then you have wasted all of your money. Will never buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L.

customer_reviews.title: Great tv stand, but assembly was a nightmare
customer_reviews.text: I have over 20 years experience assembling furniture. I was shocked how screws that should’ve took 5 minutes to install ended up taking hours. You have use their custom tool that was too short and didn’t fit their proprietary screws. I’m glad it’s assembled, but the manufacturer made it a real nightmare. I took a star off because of the poor tools included that didn’t fit their screws.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for dorm room or apartment
customer_reviews.text: This tv stand is nice for a dorm room or apartment. It took us a few hours to put together, because we were being careful - it is best for tvs that have a center pedestal, rather than legs on the corner. We ordered the corner model, and it fits well in our bedroom. As for the packing, it came very well packaged. All pieces were there, as well as all the screws, bolts, and such.
customer_reviews.author: My Type 2 Diabetic Life

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the time and money
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on Monday, delivered on Wednesday- such a different experience from the "3rd Party" I tried last week (a truly frustrating and AWFUL experience!!) It's a beautiful and well built piece of furniture and the instructions were clear and concise. It took me a few hours, but then I wasn't in any big hurry. The only thing I needed to add was 4 M8x20mm screws to attach the (included) mount to my Sanyo 65" TV. I've learned my lesson and will stick with Amazon from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Really great unit at low cost!
customer_reviews.text: This is surprisingly a really nice unit for such a low price! I wasn’t sure when I ordered it but we were putting it in our guest bedroom so, for the cost, I purchased. I’m so impressed with the piece that I might have to move it to our living room. It took me about 45 minutes to put it together. The instructions weren’t the best and could be improved. But, I did follow them precisely to include gluing in the dowels. The unit is very sturdy and really looks great. The size is as described. And, although it is made from particle board, the wood finish looks good. I would buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hadlockdj

customer_reviews.title: Took a while, but seems good
customer_reviews.text: Overall, my wife and I spent about 4-5 hours putting this together. We did work at a rather slow, leisurely, pace. We weren't in a hurry and just took our time. We purchased additional Wood Glue as other reviewers advised, and used it in almost every single screw / hole. I also added steel brackets in key points to strengthen it's sturdiness and strength. Overall, pretty easy build. The instructions were a little iffy at times. But we got it. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Aregowe

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Affordable TV Stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice tv stand and pretty easy to assemble, even for myself who's not the most experienced in assembling things. Like other reviews said, it was nicely packed and took about two hours to assemble. My only gripe with it is that if you were to add shelves to it, the notches are only about an inch apart, meaning there isn't going to be much room between shelves.
customer_reviews.author: MrSavoie2U

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tv stand
customer_reviews.text: I came back the day after this was delivered to give a review. This tv stand is beautiful. It arrived earlier than expected. It was packaged very well with all of the required pieces there. None of the wood was damaged in transit. The poor ups man even had to carry this very heavy package up to my second floor apartment (sorry :/) I built this by myself in under two hours. I wouldn’t say assembly was easy, but the instructions were very detailed and everything was labeled appropriately. Overall I am very satisfied with my purchase. $220 is a hefty hunk of change but I am completely happy with the quality and size of this stand! I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Racine

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered this walker Edison fireplace tv console. I was very disappointed in the quality having paid $350. It was missing screws and given wrong screw sizes! I had to go buy proper ones. Then on top of this, the instructions literally had pieces covered up with WHITE OUT. We finally got it all put together after spending money to get additional parts and the instructions not being much help. Then when I reached out to customer service they responded over a week later saying they’d replace the parts. Keep in mind I’ve already had to go buy them myself and have them assembled in the fireplace, poor quality and poor customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: This tv stand is good quality. We had a hard time assembling it ...
customer_reviews.text: This tv stand is good quality. We had a hard time assembling it because some parts were difficult to put together. But the results were good. The packaging was horrible. The box it came in wasn’t stong enough to support its weight and the tape wasn’t strong enough either to keep the box closed. I wish I had taken a picture of it but we were focused on bringing the pieces individually inside because the box was broken. They didn’t deliver it exactly to our front door (I guess because it was too heavy) they left it by the driveway.
customer_reviews.author: Ale

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Easy to Assemble, Looks Great.
customer_reviews.text: The shipment arrived a day early. The packaging was excellent, not only in securing/protecting the product, but also easy to unpack. All the parts were very clearly labeled, and there was no damage of any kind. The instructions were very clear, and it took me about 90 minutes to unpack and fully assemble the product. As other reviewers have commented, there isn't enough glue. I used it sparingly, and it was sufficient, but more would be better. That said, the product assembled very securely and all the parts/holes lined up correctly. One person can easily assemble it. For the price, it is excellent value, and looks considerably more expensive than its actual price.
customer_reviews.author: Ken R.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: We shopped for a TV stand at several and this one came out on top. Good quality construction, easy to assemble (took about and hour), all the holes lined up correctly and looks good. The only suggestion is pay close attention to each panel and the instruction booklet pictures. It is easy to get a panel in backwards. We did this twice and it was not an issue undoing and redoing it correctly. The pictures show the correct orientation but the pictures were not real clear and the slots for the back panels did not show well. Overall, we would buy this unit again. It is much cheaper then anything we found in the stores and looked much better.
customer_reviews.author: Birdieman

customer_reviews.title: Great Entertainment Center
customer_reviews.text: This is a great entertainment center with lots of storage space. The fireplace does put out a good amount of heat which helps when you live in Seattle. It fits our 72” TV perfectly and the inserts for wires on either side are the perfect size. I will say that one of the back inserts did come damaged but since it faces the wall, you can’t tell and we didn’t think it was enough for a bad review. Assembly took approximately one hour.
customer_reviews.author: iVurbs

customer_reviews.title: Good price, color is a little off.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 58” driftwood. Price is good but product is not as it appears in the pictures. The one I received looks a lot darker, more of a gray color. Despite the color difference it still worked with the room and I decided to keep it. I should mention that I viewed the pictures on different devices, and adjusted the brightness before buying. Obviously that didn’t help. Hope this detail helps other buyers when deciding on a color. Overall it’s a decent tv stand.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa V.

customer_reviews.title: Great stand!
customer_reviews.text: We love this tv stand! We have a tv that needs to be mounted but live in an apartment where that isn’t an option. This stand is the perfect solution! We have two cats who run and jump on the stand and it stays still. There’s plenty of room for storage, we keep our board games in one cubby and game systems in the other. We’ve had this stand for over two years now and I plan on keeping it until it finally falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hall

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tv stand highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love this tv stand I want to cry! The wood is so beautiful and so sleek! It’s so beautiful!!!! Very beautiful, lonely addition of furniture to my home! Took about twenty minutes to assemble! Beautiful piece! 5 thumbs up! I love this tv stand! So nice! It will make a lovely addition to anyone’s home.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Guru

customer_reviews.title: Super waste of time and effort - DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: We had to return this because a part was defective. Company didn't even try to replace the part, just told me to send it back for a replacement. I sent it back and replaced with something different. SUPER ANNOYING because we put a lot of effort into getting the huge box upstairs and the stand half assembled before discovering the problem; then had to fit it back into the box and wrestle it back downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harrington

product_meta.title: Walker Edison Furniture Company Minimal Farmhouse Wood Fireplace Universal Stand for TV's up to 80" Flat Screen Living Room Storage Shelves Entertainment Center, White Oak
product_meta.description: Color:White Oak| Style Name:70 Inch Fireplace TV StandDisplay your TV in style with this 70-inch TV stand and electric fireplace. Crafted from high-grade MDF with a durable laminate finish for a rich, textured surface, this storage console features two adjustable shelves on both sides of the fireplace for anything from your electronics to your home décor. With a cord management port at the back of each shelving space, you’ll never have to worry about a tangled mess of wires as it’ll keep them organized. This entertainment center mixes a traditional style with the on trend rustic farmhouse look with its simple design and will be a classic piece to your living room. This media stand will accommodate most flat-panel TVs up to 70 inches. Installation for the fireplace requires no technician, simply plug into any standard household outlet.
feature_bullets: Cable management features to run cords in the back of the TV stand
Fireplace display and heat can be turned on individually
Includes electric fireplace that will heat up to 400 sq. ft. (4600 BTU)
No electrician required, as the electric fireplace is a simple plug-in unit

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars9,132 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
